specifications.Care Advice: Woven > Satin Weave > Satin This fabric is easily damaged by rubbing or scratching, so please handle it with care.
specifications.Care Instructions: Hand wash only Wash separately Turn inside out before washing, Do not wring Do not bleach Line dry Iron on low heat on reverse side if needed Sustainability Eco-forward > Dead Stock This fabric is deadstock (leftover from previous productions) and will not be restocked after selling out. Recommended Use Bridal, Dresses, Pajamas
